meta.description: Determine the number of small and large boxes to use for shipping masks to minimize the total number of boxes while meeting mask distribution requirements.

sets.name: BOX_TYPES
sets.description: Types of boxes used for shipping masks.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of masks each box type can hold.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of boxes of each type to use.

objective.name: min_total_boxes
objective.description: Minimize the total number of boxes used.

constraints.name: mask_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 750 masks are distributed.

constraints.name: small_large_ratio
constraints.description: Ensure at least three times as many small boxes as large boxes are used.

constraints.name: min_large_boxes
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5 large boxes are used.
